title: கூட்டு பலாத்காரம் செய்யப்பட்ட அலிகார் சிறுமி: இணையதள செய்தி உண்மையா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Akash Kulhary, SSP Aligarh on 2.5-year-old girl death case: We are proceeding with it as an NSA case, we'll try to get it to a fast track court. There is no mention of rape or acid in postmortem report. 2 accused have been arrested, 5 police officials have been suspended. (6.6) pic.twitter.com/2Z1vbSZ4nB
